text: Ne oturursunuz ulan öyle camış gibi?
english: Why are you sitting there like buffaloes?
What's wrong, brother? Is the enemy coming?
My son is coming, my son!

text: Ne bakarsınız ulan? Baba oluyorum, baba, baba!
english: What are you staring at, you idiots? I'm becoming a father, dad, dad!

text: ...Allah torunlarını da görmeyi nasip eder inşallah.
english: God grant you the opportunity to see your grandchildren, inshallah.

text: Allah sana da senin gibi evlatlar nasip etsin.
english: God grant you children like yourself .

text: Hayırlı evladı olanın amel defteri kapanmaz der...
english: The book of deeds of one who has righteous children will never be closed..." Oh

text: Allah'ım bize senin gibi bir evlat nasip ettiği için...
english: God, we can never thank you enough for blessing us with a son like you.

text: ...sizin evladınız olmaktan fazla gurur vermez ana.
english: ...would bring more pride than being your child, mother.

text: Yakın vakte kadar kıt kanaat geçinirken...
english: Until recently we were barely making ends meet...

text: ...artık toy üzerine toy yapar olduk kızım.
english: ...but now we're having wedding after wedding, my daughter.
hard days are behind us now. From
now on, may peace never leave our lives... and may
our celebrations never lack abundance, God willing.
God willing, my daughter, God willing.

has arrived, Hayme Ana. -Please come in.
your wedding be joyous and your table bountiful.
